# com.apple.developer.driverkit

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your extension has permission to run as a user-space driver.

## Discussion

Add this entitlement to every DriverKit driver you create. You must request this entitlement from Apple. For information about how to request the entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/system-extensions/].
title: com.apple.developer.driverkit
